channel.title: Basic on Pete's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Basic on Pete's Website

item.title: ARTE (AWS Red Team Expert) Review
item.description:
Hi Everyone! I recent passed the ARTE (AWS Red Team Expert) certification and I wanted to write a short blurb on the course, the exam, and the entire experience. As with most things I say, these thoughts are my own and donâ€™t necessarily reflect those of my employer, HackTricks, my religion, or anybody/anything else.

Background: I am a pentester and have done cloud reviews before so some topics were a review for me. Additionally, I have the pentester mindset so I came into the course with the ability to enumerate well, think critically, and know when I am going down a rabbit hole.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Howdy! This is my little corner of the internet where I post about things. I’m not very good at keeping this updated, but I do cool things sometimes and I like to talk about them in case other people find them cool. I hope you find something cool here. If not, check back again later. Thanks!
